TopicTitle: Kerbinside style launchsites, but with the new stock system.

Articles.Content: Id love to have a mod that adds more launch sites to kerbin similar to how kerbinside used to, but using the new stock feature. Woomerang is cool and all, but id love for launch sites all over the planet, and having multiple pads around the KSC would be cool as well. just an idea, would love to see it implemented though!
